participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, but struggles with procrastination and staying organized.
participant_1.background: I have a lot of fun in my free time, but I struggle to get things done. I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult. I was born male and transitioned to female when I was 17. I love riding roller coasters. I love iced tea.

participant_2.name: Jamie Taylor
participant_2.personality: Grounded and family-oriented, with a focus on health and wellness.
participant_2.background: I made a delicious cake for my friends and family to celebrate my birthday. I'm not too interested in social media, I'd rather be focusing on my yoga and finding a partner to spend my life with. I've two siblings. My favorite singer is Justin Timberlake. I have to live by a schedule in order to keep my mind right.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Doing great! I just made a delicious cake for my birthday.
Oh that's so cool! What kind of cake?
Chocolate!
Yummy! I love chocolate. What are your plans for the day?
Well, I'm going to go to the gym and then take a yoga class.
Oh nice! I want to get into yoga more. What's your favorite part about it?
I love how it helps me relax and clear my head.
That's awesome! I have a friend who does yoga and she says the same thing.
Yeah, it's really great.
Do you like any other kinds of exercise?
I like running and biking.
Me too! Running is my favorite.
It's a great way to stay in shape.
Yeah, and it's a good way to clear your head.
Exactly! I love running in the park.
That's my favorite place to run too.
Cool! We should run together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! We can exchange numbers and plan a day.
Awesome
